overview: It's Spring Break in Fievre Du Printemps, so eight hunky young guys want to get away from it all. But what do fit young guys do in an isolated house, miles from anywhere? Well, these randy studs can't get enough of each other as they let the springtime juices flow. They lock lips and indulge their passion for hot sex - hot bareback sex!
title: Fièvre Du Printemps
